My answer to Sy.
The Only stern part,
-Paragraph 5, Some
Personal exceptions.
Was written several
days after receipt of
the letter, so is
not just an attempt to
blow off steam.
Some, of the
comments in the original
letter bother me a
good deal. I donâ€™t
mind being wrong a good
share of the time, but
to have my motives and
my inetentions slandered
is quite another matter.
It seems in exceptionally
bad taste to me, and
I should like this
reaction known to the
rest of the baord.
Have also enclosed
what mail there is.
